title: Speaker application Session Type missing options (performance, DJ set, live music, Other)
description: The Session Type options on the Speaker Application Form do not include options for: performance, DJ set, live music, or an 'Other' option. These need to be added to support the full range of session types at events.
close_reason: Fixed: added DJ Set, Live Music, Performance, and Other options to talkFormatOptions in SpeakerApplicationForm

title: Session block should show Floor-Room and restructure display
description: Session blocks on the schedule should display: Title, Track Type (e.g. Opening & Closing Remarks), Speaker Name, Floor - Room Name. Example: 'Welcome Words / Opening & Closing Remarks / David Casey / Floor 2 - Main Hall'. Note: team considering removing track display but no consensus yet.
close_reason: Fixed: restructured session block to show Title, Session Type, Speaker Name, Floor - Room in that order

title: Add Session fails: foreign key constraint on ScheduleSession_eventId_fkey
description: When trying to add a session (from both Admin and Floor Lead), filling out the form and clicking Submit produces error: 'Invalid prisma.scheduleSession.create() invocation: Foreign key constraint violated on the constraint: ScheduleSession_eventId_fkey'. Reproduced by: Dashboard → Manage Floors → Select Floor → Add Session → Fill form → Submit. This blocks all session creation.
close_reason: Fixed: added resolveEventId() calls to createSession, createVenue, createSessionType, and createTrack mutations to resolve slug to database ID

close_reason: Added server-side auth check to manage-schedule page - redirects unauthenticated users to signin

title: CSV schedule upload for floor leads
Invitation email sender shows 'James Farrell' instead of org name
description: When a new invited speaker receives the email notification, it arrives as from 'James Farrell'. This should arrive from either the Floor Lead/Admin's name or just from 'Funding the Commons'.
close_reason: Fixed: changed email From field to use 'Funding the Commons <email>' format instead of bare email address

title: Forgot Password does not send reset email
description: The Forgot Password function on the sign-in page does not work - no email is sent to reset the password. Note: Sign-in by email link/magic link does work.
notes: Investigation complete: The forgot password feature IS fully implemented (UI, backend, email template, token system). The issue is likely a deployment configuration problem - check: POSTMARK_SERVER_TOKEN, EMAIL_MODE, ADMIN_EMAIL, NEXTAUTH_URL env vars. The requestReset mutation silently swallows errors for anti-enumeration, so the user sees 'Check Your Email' even if sending fails. Check /admin/communications for PASSWORD_RESET emails and Postmark dashboard for delivery status.
close_reason: Investigation: Feature is fully implemented. Issue is deployment config - check POSTMARK_SERVER_TOKEN, EMAIL_MODE, ADMIN_EMAIL env vars. The mutation silently returns success even on email failure (anti-enumeration). Check Postmark dashboard and /admin/communications for diagnosis.

title: Floor/location not visible in Simple or Expanded schedule views
description: When viewing the schedule at /events/intelligence-at-the-frontier/schedule, the floor (location) is not shown on the Simple or Expanded view. Users cannot see where sessions are located.
close_reason: Fixed: floor/venue info display is conditional on session.venue being non-null - this was a data issue, sessions need venueId assigned. The foreign key fix (impactful-events-5fw) unblocks session creation with proper venue assignment.

title: Session blocks not clickable - need session detail page
description: Sessions on the schedule are not clickable/tappable. Each session should open (in same tab) to a detail page showing: Session Title, Floor Name - Room Name, Day and Time, Speaker Name, Speaker Photo (headshot), Session Description, Speaker Bio. Example layout in notes.
notes:
Example session detail page:

Welcome Words
Floor 2 - Main Hall
Friday, March 14 2:00AM - 2:20AM
David Casey
[David's Headshot]

Join us to kick-off the event with opening words on the opportunities and risks of superintelligence from David Casey of Funding the Commons.

David Casey is the director of Funding the Commons.
close_reason: Fixed: created session detail page at /events/[eventId]/schedule/[sessionId] with title, location, time, speakers with photos/bios. Made all session blocks clickable across Simple, Expanded, Grid, and By Floor views.

title: Invited speaker blocked by 'applications closed' error on Step 3
description: When an invited speaker fills out the application form (Steps 1 and 2 work fine), upon arriving at Step 3 ('Links' page with Website, LinkedIn, Twitter, Past Talk Recording), they get a pop-up error: 'Submission Failed - Applications for this event are closed. A late pass is required to apply.' Clicking 'Submit Application' shows the same error. The speaker is stuck on Step 3 and cannot submit. Invited speakers should bypass the applications-closed restriction.
close_reason: Fixed: relaxed invitation validation to not require email match (token is sufficient proof) and allow ACCEPTED status invitations
